PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO and LUMO energy levels of the polymers were determined by cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) measurements ( Figure 3 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO energy levels of the polymers |
| LUMO energy levels of the polymers |

These are the valid entities identified in the paragraph. HOMO and LUMO refer to the Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital and the Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital energy levels respectively, of the polymers.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO energy levels of the polymers |
| LUMO energy levels of the polymers |

These are the valid entities identified in the paragraph. HOMO and LUMO refer to the Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital and the Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital energy levels respectively, of the polymers. These values represent material properties. The other entities in the paragraph, such as "cyclic voltammetry (CV)" and "measurements" do not clearly refer to material properties and can be considered contextual information.
